name: Intuitive Appz
description:
Intuitive Appz is a Brazilian Corporation whose goal is to build apps that create synergy between companies and their clients.
Founded in September 2010, Intuitive Appz combines our vast knowledge in marketing, advertising, and software, apps and games development with new cutting-edge technology. Our Founders expertise in these fields is a perfect match for the innovative and ever-changing mobile market.

locations.address: Av. Cel. Fernando Prestes 350 7º andar - Santo André - SP
